data.title: Uganda - birth rate 2012-2022
data.meta_description: The crude birth rate in Uganda decreased by 0.6 live births per 1,000 inhabitants (-1.63 percent) since the previous year.
data.text:
Crude birth rate in Uganda 2012-2022

Published by

Uganda: Birth rate from 2012 to 2022 (per 1,000 inhabitants)

More information

Region

Uganda

Survey time period

2012 to 2022

Special properties

crude birth rate

Supplementary notes

The crude birth rate indicates the number of live births occurring during the year, per 1,000 population estimated at midyear. Subtracting the crude death rate from the crude birth rate provides the rate of natural increase, which is equal to the rate of population change in the absence of migration.
